## SendableKumo.liquidateUpTo() method

Liquidate the least collateralized Troves up to a maximum number.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
liquidateUpTo(asset: string, maximumNumberOfTrovesToLiquidate: number): Promise<SentKumoTransaction<S, KumoReceipt<R, LiquidationDetails>>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  asset | string |  |
|  maximumNumberOfTrovesToLiquidate | number | Stop after liquidating this many Troves. |
